page.syntax: L AddUserGroup(UserName as C, GroupName as C)
page.description: Make the user a member of the group in the currently connected database or server.
page.original:
SQL::Connection::AddUserToGroup() Syntax Result_Flag as L = .AddUserToGroup( UserName as C, GroupName as C ) ArgumentDescription Result_FlagTRUE (.T.) if the operation was successful; otherwise FALSE (.F.). A SQL::Connection object. UserNameThe user's login name. GroupNameThe name of the group.
Description The SQL::Connection::AddUserToGroup() method makes UserName a member of the GroupName in the currently connected database or server. Limitations Example dim conn as SQL::Connection dim connString as C connString = "{A5API='SQLServer', Server='doc3000', Trusted_connection=yes, Database='Northwind'}" if .not. conn.open(connString) ui_msg_box("Error", conn.CallResult.text) end end if if .not. conn.AddUserToGroup("Edward", "Techwriting") ui_msg_box("Error", conn.CallResult.text) end if conn.close()
See Also SQL::Connection Object
